title: About Me
description: I have a deep love for building things and automating workflows. My passion lies in applying Artificial Intelligence to real-world problems, backed by a strong foundation in Mathematics. I am eager to kickstart a professional career filled with learning and ambitious projects.

When I'm not coding, I'm active and outgoing. You can find me at the gym, swimming, or trying out a new Zumba class. I'm also a huge foodie who loves long walks, exploring coffee shops, and meeting new people while traveling.
I believe technology should be a tool to solve meaningful challenges, and I'm ready to contribute to that mission.
